articles.author: Syriacus Buguzi
articles.title: A Deadly Cousin of Ebola Has Flared Up in Africa - WIRED
articles.description: The World Health Organization is gearing up to test vaccines against the Marburg virus—but the world is still not prepared to contain new viral outbreaks.
articles.content: In February, a 23-year-old Tanzanian fisherman suddenly fell ill, having just returned from a busy trading outpost in the middle of Lake Victoria. Back at home in Bukoba, a district in northwestern T… [+2978 chars]
